p: The secondary objectives are to compare the effect of azithromycin in participants with a PCR-confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19 in reducing the proportion with either death or hospital admission with respiratory failure requiring invasive or non-invasive mechanical ventilatory support over 28â€‰days from randomisation (for those who had a COVID-19 swab at randomisation), to compare differences in all-cause mortality, to compare differences in proportion progressing to pneumonia, to compare differences in proportion progressing to severe pneumonia and to compare differences in peak severity of illness.
